output: stop my dear watson stop have solved the case of missing diamond stop discovered footprints in garden leading to secret passageway stop jewel thief is none other than lord willoughby's personal assistant mr hawkins stop found diamond concealed within false book in library stop arrest warrant needed for mr hawkins posthaste stop await your arrival to finalize details stop sherlock holmes
instruction: Imagine you are Sherlock Holmes. In his style, write a telegram solving a mystery.
